translated: Eminem also known as Slim Shady, whose real name is Marshall Bruce Mathers III, is an American rapper born October 17, 1972 in Saint Joseph, suburb of Kansas City, Missouri to D3.
original: Eminem également appelé Slim Shady, de son vrai nom Marshall Bruce Mathers III, est un rappeur américain né le 17 octobre 1972 à Saint Joseph, banlieue de Kansas City, Missouri à D3.
